name: Saint Seiya Leo Armor
description:
Sharing your images created with this Lora in the comments below means a lot to me, Also let me know your top 5 knights in the comments that will affect the queue for my next Loras, I'm thinking of other Saint Seiya knights, Asgard/Poseidon/Hades arcs

Creating Loras is expensive please consider buying me a coffee so you can help me continue to create and share my work with the world. Your support will allow me to invest in better equipment, and take the time to create new and exciting pieces

LEO ARMOR

The Leo Armor is a powerful and majestic armor worn by the Leo Gold Saint in the Saint Seiya anime and manga series. It is one of the twelve Zodiac armors, each representing a constellation.

This LORA captures the Armor of Leo, ignoring the character, trying to be flexible to be worn by males or females. is based on SD1.5 , and works with Anime models but was not intended for that. I will train another one based on Anime models later on.

The Lora works well with strength between 0.5 and 0.7; it was trained on images of 768 by 768 so use that resolution preferably. Also, I recommend using Image to Image and control-net for scaling instead of high res fix but is a matter of choice.

modelVersions.name: LeoArmor 1.0 (photorealistic)

meta.prompt: <lora:LeoArmor:0.6> masterpiece, best quality, masterpiece, Scarlett Johansson wearing sexy battle armor, casting an electric spell in the ruins of an Atlantis temple. The water is cut in half as a result of the spell, creating a dramatic effect. The white cape blowing in the breeze adds a touch of elegance and grace to the medieval-inspired setting. The intricate details of the temple's ruins add to the fantasy-like ambiance, evoking the mystique of the mythical city of Atlantis. The lighting emphasizes the dramatic effect, creating an otherworldly atmosphere that adds to the magical quality of the scene. Johansson's pose and expression convey a sense of power and determination, making the viewer feel as if they too are part of the fantasy adventure.
